title: Pop It Rockets in Space Jigsaw
description: Pop It Rockets in Space Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images with pop-it rockets in space in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it playing. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Lazy Jumper
description: Lazy Jumper is an arcade game to make the lazy guy jump around and enter the swimming pool. Destroy everything in front of your way in a satisfying way with cool and nice design and effects. to get stars.
instructions: Use space or the left mouse button to make the lazy guy jump.

title: Room Escape 3D
description: Room Escape 3D is an interesting puzzle online game for free. You need to use some ways to avoid the guards, and don't let them find you. Try to outwit the enemy! You can test your logical thinking ability in this one of the best 3D prison games. All kinds of cool action tasks and puzzles are waiting for you! The overall operation of the game is not difficult, but you need to be bold, careful, and flexible to play this game well!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Dot Crusher
description: Before you on the screen you will see a playing field on which there will be two planks. A ball will hang between them in space. You will have to click on it with your mouse. Thus, you will call a special arrow with which you can set the strength and trajectory of the ball. When ready, you will make your move. You will need to make sure that the ball touches both bars. Once this happens, you will receive points and proceed to the next level of the game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Flappy Copter
description: Flappy Copter is a HTML5 game where you where you controls the copter to past through the pipes without crashing in the rounded world.
instructions: Touch anywhere on the screen.

title: Rescue Boss Cut Rope
description: Cut the rope to rescue your boss! An unconventional yet fun cut the rope game to play. There are many traps in the room. You need to be careful which rope you cut.
instructions: Decide the fate of your boss

title: Crypto Master!
description: Collect your dollars, Buy some crypto, Add to your trail and get rich at the end! Avoid hitting different obstacles and pass through different challenges at each level to become rich. You can hodl or buy fancy items! Its your money and its all up to you!
instructions: Use your mouse and click and hold left button and drag left/right in order to move left/right.

title: Color Pop 3D
description: Paint the whole circle by dodging steel plates in the way and complete as many levels as you can. Show your awesome skills in this satisfying color hypercasual game. Are you ready to prove your skills?
instructions: Tap On Screen/Press Space and Hold to shoot Release Hold to stop shooting

title: Math Games For Adults
description: It's a fun and original puzzle game, a mix of crosswords and math equations. You must solve the equations with additions, multiplications, soustractions and divisions. If your equation is correct, the line will change to green. if it's incorrect if will change to red. If it is incorrect, move the pieces until all the board becomes green. This game has a lot of levels and you can choose between several difficulty modes, from novice to insane levels !
instructions: move the yellow tiles piece and place them on the free spots.

title: Desert Faces
description: In this match 3 game with 25 levels you have to solve different tasks within a short amount of time in each level. Match pairs of 3 to remove them from the grid.
instructions: Use the mouse or the finger to swap the faces and match pairs of 3

title: Rope Man Rush 3D
description: Rope Man Run 3D is a skillful running arcade game with a 3D colored rope man. Your goal is to avoid all obstacles and collect colored ropes of the same color as the rope man to reach the final circular platform safely.
instructions: Drag to move

title: Word Learner
description: Word Learner is a brain puzzle game for toddlers and kids. You can play by category or random. Select one of the given categories such are: the category with animals, fruits, countries, birds, and flowers. When you select the category the word will show on the top of the screen. Watch the word he will disappear for short time. The alphabet will show on the screen and you need to click on the alphabet to get the correct word. Learn new words, names, and letters.
instructions: Use a mouse to tap on the alphabet, or tap on the screen on mobile devices.

title: Boller
description: Aim the ball at the bricks with numbers on them. The number on the bricks indicate the number of hits required to destroy the bricks. Destroy the bricks before they reach the bottom of the screen to keep playing.
instructions: Aim the ball by clicking and dragging at the ball and direct them towards the bricks.

title: Monsters Rotate
description: Play our newest casual puzzle game Monsters Rotate. The game has 10 levels with different fun monsters. Each level is locked and it will be unlocked when you solve the previous level. Build the correct image by clicking to rotate the pieces of the puzzle before time runs out. Enjoy and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Align 4 BIG
description: The game mission is to align a series of 4 pawns of the same color on a grid . In turn, the two players place a pawn in the column of their choice, the pawn then slides to the lowest possible position in the said column after which it is up to the opponent to play. The winner is the player who first succeeds in making a consecutive alignment of at least four pawns of his color.
instructions: Drop your discs in the columns of the game grid by pressing on the chosen column. Make a line of at least four tokens either vertically, horizontally or diagonally before your opponent.

title: Line bright
description: Linebright is a HTML5 game where you have to solve elegant puzzle game set in a world of lines. Solve different interesting and mind blowing levels and increase your IQ.
instructions: 1) Press WSAD Keys to move the line 2) Solve puzzle and avoid obstacles 3) Collect crystal to complete

title: Zoo Slings
description: In the game Zoo Slings you can help six different types of animals get to the cherished basket on twenty levels. To do this, you need to jump over, pushing off and clinging to round wooden bars until the animal is in the basket. At each level, new obstacles will be added that need to be bypassed.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Healing Rush
description: Welcome to Healing Rush! In Healing Rush you play as a doctor in a new hospital. Citizens have fallen ill to strange diseases, let's get down to healing them! Only you can help – build the greatest hospital in town and save all the patients! Your patients have many complex and strange diseases. Hurry up and use the right medicine to heal them in this simple and very addicting action game!
instructions: Control with the virtual joystick

title: Ball Stack 3D
description: Ball Stack 3D is fun addictive hyper casual game. Swipe to Collect Color Balls Make Tall Stack tower to Reach Destination Have Fun. This game looks easy but difficult to play as the level increases.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Uphill Rush 10
description: Uphill Rush 10 takes you all across New York City in 20 exhilarating levels. Your first vehicle will be the iconic yellow cab, but there will be 38 other vehicles for you to unlock. Race through NYC on a skateboard, scooter, motor, horse, hovercraft and many more! Not sure what to wear? We got you covered! There are 66 different outfits to choose from! Make sure to upgrade your vehicles to set the quickest times in each level. The faster you go, the more likely you win those 3 stars!
instructions: Use arrow keys on the keyboard or the onscreen buttons on mobile

title: Alien World
description: A simple and intuitive game in the shoot ’em up genre. — Fight alien enemies — Upgrade your ship — Join the battle with the bosses — Move along the story company Find a new home for our civilization. But first, destroy all the enemies!
instructions: The main goal is to survive at any cost! Shoot at the enemies. Upgrade your ship. Use boosters during the game, it can help pass the level. Fight bosses at the end of the chapter.

title: Wordling Daily Challenge
description: How do you guess a five-letter word with five chances? Here is a hard-core five-letter word guessing puzzle game with a 2D keyboard. The color of each letter on both blocks and buttons on the keyboard will show you how close to the correct answer is. If you see a green one, that means the letter appears where it should be. Good luck and show your brain!
instructions: Tap the buttons on the screen

title: BallBlaster
description: Shoot the ball as they come, how long can you survive? Getting bored in your free time? Want to experience unique rock shooting game? Prepare yourself to handle one of the deadliest cannons in this stellar cannon blasting game. Invest your energies in this entertaining and highly addictive ball shooting game for the ultimate action and thrill.
instructions: Move the cannon to shoot the rocks

title: Squid Marble Game
description: To get the marble into the hole in Squid Marble Game, aim the marble well and take your shot. If you don't get it in the hole, you're out of the game. If the game is successful, try to put the marble in the hole again in the next plane. Take shots to succeed in 50 different levels. Play Marble Game right now!
instructions: Mouse Swipe

title: Skates Sky Roller
description: Do you like skating? Do you want to try different skateboards and skating skills? Skate Sky Roller is a fun casual game. The goal of this game is to change the position of the skateboard at any time according to the obstacles until you reach the finish line. In addition, you need to collect as many skateboards as possible to pass the obstacles. Don't wait anymore, just come here and enjoy our new game!
instructions: Slide to move

title: PopStar Mania
description: The classic puzzle game of 2022-PopStar Mania. Once you pop, you can't stop! Tap on two or more adjacent blocks to destroy them. An exciting game with cool Effects. It is good casual game to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain for all ages.
instructions: - Just tap two or more blocks of the same color popping. - There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage. - The more blocks you popping, the more score you will get. - Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of bonus!

title: Alphabet Game
description: Alphabet game is a game where the player learns and exercises his knowledge with letters, alphabet and objects. Perfect for children who have learned or are starting to learn to read and write.
instructions: On the computer: Use the mouse. On mobile: Use touch.

title: MY CUTE PET
description: My cute pet is a memory card game with super cute animals. With each level the number of cards will increase bringing more illustrations of cute animals.
instructions: Use mouse or touch screen to flip each card, make combinations of two cards to score points, level will be completed after matching all pairs of cute animals.

title: Funky Plane
description: Hello Pilot, your job is to fly the Funky Air Flybus B230. Take to the skies, avoid the clouds, collect fun items! How many points can you score in 60 seconds? A fun, safe, and friendly game for all.
instructions: Take to the skies, fly on a funky airplane

title: Stair Run Online 2
description: Check out this new stair running game! Share it with your friends and enjoy yourself! The goal of this game is to collect as many stair pieces as you can in the running time. Also, when you encounter an obstacle, you need to press and hold the screen to make the stairs rise. Luckily, you can get rewards and unlock new exciting skins. This sounds great! Come and try this game! Have fun with it!
instructions: Mouse click or tap the screen to play

title: RESOLVE a math game
description: If you like math, or not... you will definitively love RESOLVE, the best math game ever. It is a fun game, it is quick and easy to play, and it is also challenging for everyone. At the bottom of the screen you can see unfilled equations. The solution is on the top of the screen. Just link the correct numbers together so you can complete the equation. Easy, isn't it? Really? Well play RESOLVE now and find if you are a true math genius.
instructions: link the correct numbers together so you can complete the equation

title: Boxman Sokoban
description: Boxman Sokoban is a free classic box-pushing puzzle game. The objective is to put all the boxes in the marked positions by pushing one at a time. There are 100 levels to play.
instructions: Desktop: Use arrow keys or WASD to move the boxman, Z to undo, and R to restart. Mobile: Swipe to move. Or you can use the Buttons UI to control and play.

title: Bag Design Shop
description: Welcome creative & Fashionista girls it’s time to fulfill your fashion mania with this most interesting game for girls. Bag Design Shop designer is the most creative game for those Fashionista girls who love to be always in new fashion trends. You can design & decorate your own bag for your wedding parties & for special events. Are you ready to play this addictive girl bag designer game?
instructions: Use mouse to interact bag tools.

title: Puzzling
description: Puzzline is an easy yet exciting way to exercise your brain and relax your mind on the go! Experience the benefits of line puzzles: on your way to work, before bed or whenever you need to kill time, this brand new brain training puzzle game is the perfect way to activate your brain while having fun! Simply drag the pegs and arrange the strings into amazing colorful designs like cats, rockets, flowers, and many more.
instructions: • Drag the pegs into a hole. • Undo tangled and overlapping string! • Try to copy the suggested shape above. • Enjoy cute and cool designs by moving dots.

title: Bounce And Pop
description: Bounce And Popo is a funny arcade game which can train your brain flexibility! The players only need to control the gears to smash the balloon will be able to pass the levels. Aim at the goal and launch the gear firstly! Then control it to smash all the balloons! Let's try it now! To unlock more and more levels to challenge! Come on!
instructions: Tap to play!

title: Veggie Slice Frenzy
description: Tap and drag to slice veggies. Slash and swing your blade around the screen, creating beautiful patterns. Create beautiful slicing combos to earn double, triple and quadruple score. Fill up the bar to activate FRENZY mode. Defeat the boss veggie with your ninja skills. How high can you score?
instructions: Slice and dice veggies

title: Destroy Figures
description: The brown ball in Destroy Figures is your weapon from which a mass of small balls will fly out. With them you will bombard white geometric shapes that will fall on top of you. At the same time, they will not fall one or two at a time, but will tumble down in a whole heap. You must quickly orient yourself and start a heavy bombardment around the entire perimeter, so as not to give a single figure break through the dotted border line. You have ten charges left, with which you must destroy a maximum of objects. Shoot the cluster, so you have a chance to hit several at once with one ball and save on the projectile.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Cut Grass
description: Cut Grass is a relaxing and beautiful lawn mower simulation and puzzle game. Become a Gardner and trim the grass and other shrubs. Cut the lawn for hours and grow beautiful flowers. Solve a variety of challenging and puzzling levels.
instructions: Swipe to cut the grass/ Use arrow keys.

title: JumpyPig
description: Jump through the platforms, avoid falling, and going off screen. The closer to the center of the platform you land, the more points you'll get. The platforms come in various sizes and colors, and moving in different directions.
instructions: Tap to jump from one platform to another.

title: Smash it 3D
description: Are you a good target shooter? Do you enjoy smashing things, chopping wood, or slaying cockroaches? If you're looking for a way to let off steam or smash things, Smash it 3D is the game for you. You can smash as much as you want without breaking anything. Now is the time to play and have a good time!
instructions: Click on Screen to make a HIT

title: Fill In the holes
description: Are you ready to play this fantastic puzzle game ? It is an easy game do not panic. First, look at the numbers on the grid. Each of them should fill the same amount of boxes/fiels. So if you see a 4, there should be 4 boxes near this tile that should be fill with this same color. I told you it's easy to understand... However, it's a bit harder to master on higher levels, but first ones are super easy to learn and to enjoy this nice puzzle game.
instructions: Each of them should fill the same amount of boxes/fiels

title: Pipe Balls
description: In this exciting brain game, you have to bring all your intelligence and skill. You need to lead the balls from the machine to the goal cup. Sounds simple, right? It’s not! Because the pipes are disconnected, and it’s up to you to reconnect them in the right way.
instructions: Use mouse left button to click pipes and rotate them.

title: Sling Tomb
description: Help the little pets to sling and bounce to the top but watch out the obstacles and deadly traps. Go up and race against the water for your life climbing the tomb tower, collecting coins, diamonds, and power ups. Use the coins to unlock new pets and reach new highs to challenge your friends.
instructions: Sling to aim and shoot.

title: Happy Easter Game
description: In this game, you need to throw Easter eggs in the balloon basket. Try to put more eggs as you can in the basket. Take a position, aim, and shoot to the basket. But the rabbit that is in the balloon basket is a bad pilot and the balloon will not be stable at all. He will go up and down and left and right. For that reason will be harder to throw the eggs inside the basket. If you make a mistake and drop the eggs on the floor the new life will be born. The little chicks will hatch from the eggs.
instructions: Tap and slide on the screen to play this game.

title: Grab The Sushi
description: You only get one chance at this. Wait until the sushi is perfectly aligned with your chopsticks. Then, tap to grab that sushi! Challenging gameplay. Easy to play, hard to master with beautiful sushi graphics inspired by Japanese culture.
instructions: One chance to grab that sushi

title: Number Crush Mania
description: A legendary and fun cool game that can be played offline. Start playing Number Crush Mania in number games and a legendary puzzle game loved by millions of players around the world.This colorful number crush puzzle game has tens of thousands of levels. Do you like legend number? So crush them all, puzzles again with number in matching games for adults.
instructions: Match 3 same numbers to merge; You merge more for larger numbers and for more points; There is no time limit, so keep playing.

title: Robot Awake
description: Robot Awake is a puzzle game to wake the robots by directing the laser to power them to complete the level. There are 100 challenging levels that get more difficult as you proceed. Can you solve all levels?
instructions: Left-click on the tiles to rotate the tiles. Tap on the tiles to rotate the tiles.

title: Easter Bunny Eggs Jigsaw
description: Welcome to our newest Easter game Easter Bunny Eggs Jigsaw. In this game, you have 6 images. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it playing. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Stack Builder - Skyscraper
description: Stack Builder is a fun and simple building game, you have to build skyscrapers with a touch of your finger and your dexterity. Build a builder as high as you can, so it's can be called skyscraper
instructions: Tap or click any screen to drop the building

title: Count Master 3D
description: Count Master 3d is a fun arcade game. Let's start with capturing several castles. You can drag the formula below to add soldiers. You can also strengthen your soldiers with weapons to increase their attack power.
instructions: Control with the mouse
